sense.def:
Kadar mislimo, da je nekdo
justified in doing something
, mislimo, da ima dober razlog, da je nekaj storil.

seg.quote: I think he was quite justified in refusing to help her.

sense.def:
Dejanje, ki je
justified
, je razumno in sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: In these circumstances, massive industrial action is justified and necessary.
